titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon. Delivered upon occasion of the death of that worthy gentleman John Marsh, Esq; who lived at Garston-Hall in Watford Parish in the county of Hartford; and died in the Lord, and was buried Septemb. 16, 1681. By Samuel Slater, late minister of the Gospel at Edmunds-Bury in Suffolk.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; title-page torn; trimmed at foot, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
